title.rendered: OFFROAD ANIMAL PREDATOR BULLBAR – FORD RANGER RAPTOR (2018-2022)

content.rendered:
OFFROAD ANIMAL PREDATOR BULLBAR TO SUIT FORD RANGER RAPTOR (2018-2022)

Offroad Animal Predator bullbar to suit Ford Ranger Raptor (2018+) available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Features of the pictured bullbar include;

  • ADR compliant
  • Airbag compatible
  • Bumper replacement, with no cutting required
  • Optional top hoop – Stealth hoop which takes up to a 22″ LED light bar single row, or 2″ round tube
  • Welded one piece bar with welded wing supports
  • Only sits 150-160mm out from front of grill
  • Zinc plated then powder coated Matte black
  • Hi lift jacking points included
  • Suits most low mount winches
  • Works with factory fog lights or easily mount 2 Cube lights (per wing) or up to an 8″ LED light bar in each wing.
  • Number plate flip included for those running a winch
  • Can be colour coded to vehicle
  • Works with factory tow points
  • Heavy duty aluminium bash plates provided 5mm thick.

PLEASE NOTE: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order. 

CLICK HERE to view the range of products available for your Ford Ranger!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
